mng: square, power or involution (mathematics), upright, honest, fair and square, direction, side, party (to a contract, dispute etc), place, method, prescription (medicine), just when, only or just, classifier for square things, abbr. for square or cubic meter

exm.mng: region, regional (away from the central administration), local
convenient, suitable, to facilitate, to make things easy, having money to spare, (euphemism) to relieve oneself
plan, program (for action etc), proposal, proposed bill
